title: Bioluminescent Waves at Midnight
description: Witnessed the magical glow of bioluminescent plankton under the new moon. The waves crashed in electric blue, a truly unforgettable sight.

title: First Dive with a Sea Turtle
description: An incredibly peaceful encounter with a Green Sea Turtle at the Great Barrier Reef. It glided so effortlessly through the water.

title: Humpback Whale Breaching
description: A majestic Humpback whale launched itself completely out of the water. The sheer power and grace was awe-inspiring.

title: Clownfish in Anemone
description: Found a small family of clownfish nestled safely in their host anemone. Their vibrant orange was stunning against the reef.

title: Playful Dolphins at Sunrise
description: A pod of dolphins raced the bow of our boat as the sun came up, leaping and playing in the wake. Pure joy.

title: Giant Manta Ray Fly-by
description: A giant Manta Ray with a wingspan of at least 5 meters soared silently over our heads during a drift dive. It was like a spaceship.
